before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bclic","text":"Note: The amount of RNA required for detection depends on the abundance of the RNA of interest. In general, we recommend using \u003e 10 copies of the (SARS-CoV-2) viral genome as input, however, results may vary depending on the quality of the input. In addition, we recommend setting up a no template control reaction and that reactions are set-up in a hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k795","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vp8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r2i8","text":"The presence of carry-over products can interfere with sequencing accuracy, particularly for low copy targets. Therefore, it is important to carry out the appropriate no template control (NTC) reactions to demonstrate that positive reactions are meaningful. It is advisable to set up your reactions in the hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3ml","text":"Use this modified protocol to prepare RSV Tiled amplicons for sequencing using the VarSkip Reagents and Workflow, with cleanup steps.This original protocol details methods for the NEBNext® ARTIC SARS-CoV-2 FS Library Prep Kit (Illumina®), NEB #E7658S/L 24/96 reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: RSV Tiled Amplicon Prep (from VarSkip Workflow)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3618","text":"Overview ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a5lll","text":"The NEBNext ARTIC SARS-CoV-2 FS Library Prep Kit for Illumina contains the enzymes, buffers and oligos required to convert a broad range of total RNA into high quality, targeted, libraries for next-generation sequencing on the Illumina platform. Primers targeting the human EDF1 (NEBNext ARTIC Human Primer Mix 1) and NEDD8 (NEBNext ARTIC Human Primer Mix 2) genes are supplied as optional internal controls. The fast, user-friendly workflow also has minimal hands-on time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9u74d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1csjm","text":"Each kit component must pass rigorous quality control standards, and for each new lot the entire set of reagents is functionally validated together by construction and sequencing of indexed libraries on an Illumina sequencing platform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cf2de","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8ai9i","text":"For larger volume requirements, customized and bulk packaging is available by purchasing through the OEM/Bulks department at NEB.
